works.description:
To whom it may concern,

We believe that your website is unfortunately assisting in the unauthorized  
distribution of content owned by our

client, Igor Smirnov.

I have a good faith belief that the use of the material described below in  
the manner complained of is not

authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear, under  
penalty of perjury, that the information

in this notification is accurate (limited to the extent of the information  
I have gathered from your site) and

that my company has been authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner  
(based on the information provided by

my client). As you may know, the laws of most countries ask their citizens  
and corporations to follow policies

similar to those instituted by the World Intellectual Property Organization  
Treaty of 1996, which seeks to

prevent and make illegal any type of copyright violation such as this.

I therefore request that you remove the allegedly infringing content or  
access to the content, which can be found
